title: (x) "David Bowie" Art Deco display face - Koloss {Patricia}
content:
I'm looking for the ID of this type face. Also, I will happily take suggestions for alternatives. I'm looking for a typeface with an authentic 70's vibe. Psychedelic may also be interesting.

Thanks!  
Tim

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [David-Bowie.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010121916/http:/typophile.com/files/David-Bowie.jpg) | 24.08 KB |
author: Timothy Petersen

comments.content: Thanks! Does anyone know of a similar face. Maybe one with more contrast?

Like Koloss, but with more contrast?  
 [Broadway](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010121916/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/broadway/), but it's more Deco than '70s.
Take a look at results from MyFonts.com with search term ["70s"](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010121916/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=70s).
See what you think about [Day Poster by Nick Curtis](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010121916/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/curtis/pages/d_e.htm). maybe East Market?
